languages.text: "Как и сама ситуация. Надеюсь, вы удовлетворены, {name}. На этом я вас покину".
"So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."
languages.original_text: "Как и сама ситуация. Надеюсь, вы удовлетворены, {name}. На этом я вас покину".

traits.locale_text: "As is this entire scenario. I hope that you are satisfied, {name}. With that, I would like to take my leave."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "As is this entire scenario. I hope that you are satisfied, {name}. With that, I would like to take my leave."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."

languages.text: « À l'image de la situation dans laquelle nous nous trouvons. J'espère que vous êtes {mf|satisfait|satisfaite}, {name}. Maintenant, si vous voulez bien m'excuser, je vais vous laisser. »
languages.original_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."

traits.locale_text: « À l'image de la situation dans laquelle nous nous trouvons. J'espère que vous êtes {mf|satisfait|satisfaite}, {name}. Maintenant, si vous voulez bien m'excuser, je vais vous laisser. »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Al igual que el resto de esta situación. Espero que esté satisfech{mf|o|a}, {name}. Si me disculpa, he de marcharme».
languages.original_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."

traits.locale_text: «Al igual que el resto de esta situación. Espero que esté satisfech{mf|o|a}, {name}. Si me disculpa, he de marcharme».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “毕竟创作的环境也是相当别开生面。我希望你喜欢这幅画，{name}。抱歉，我得先告辞了。”
languages.original_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."

traits.locale_text: “毕竟创作的环境也是相当别开生面。我希望你喜欢这幅画，{name}。抱歉，我得先告辞了。”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「この状況の全てがそうです。満足したといいのですが、{name}。それではここまでで、よろしければ失礼いたします」
languages.original_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."

traits.locale_text: 「この状況の全てがそうです。満足したといいのですが、{name}。それではここまでで、よろしければ失礼いたします」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Genau wie alles andere an dieser Situation. Ich hoffe, Ihr seid zufrieden, {name}. Wenn Ihr mich nun entschuldigt."
languages.original_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."

traits.locale_text: "Genau wie alles andere an dieser Situation. Ich hoffe, Ihr seid zufrieden, {name}. Wenn Ihr mich nun entschuldigt."
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "İçinde bulunduğumuz durum da öyle. Umarım tatmin edici olmuştur {name}. Müsaadenle gidiyorum."
languages.original_text: "So is everything else about this situation. I hope you are satisfied, {name}. If you will excuse me, I will take my leave."
